name: Summon Marked Homunculus
description:
This spell allows a caster with the Mark of Making to summon a special homunculus.  If you possess a least Mark of Making, you can summon a dedicated wright, expeditions messenger, or furtive filcher homunculus (ECS 284-286), or an arbalester homunculus (Magic of Eberron 152).  If you possess a more powerful Mark of Making, you can instead summon a true homunculus (MM 154), an iron defender (ECS 287), a packmate (MoE 153), or a persistent harrier (MoE 153). A small glyph resembling your dragonmark appears somewhere on the homunculus's body.  If the homunculus is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a burst of blue, green, and purple light that deals 1d6 points of damage to all adjacent creatures except you. 
Material Component: A pinch of dragonshard dust. 
Dragonmark: Any Mark of Making
